t.PROJECT_GROUP_ID, t.PROJECT_ID, t.PRODUCT_ID, t.WORK_CONTENTS, t.WORK_DETAIL, t.FINISH_PERCENT, t.DELAY_REASON, t.ACCORD_YESTERDAY, t.IS_IMPORTANT, t.IS_EMERGENCY, t.IMPO_LEVEL, t.ID, t.DEL_FLAG, t.STATUS, t.INST_ID, t.LOGIN_IP, t.LOGIN_DATE, t.CREATE_BY, t.CREATE_DATE, t.UPDATE_BY, t.UPDATE_DATE, t.REMARKS
mapper.update: update doufu_today_work set product_Id = #{productId}, work_Contents=#{workContents}, work_Detail=#{workDetail}, finish_Percent=#{finishPercent}, delay_Reason=#{delayReason}, is_Important=#{isImportant}, is_Emergency=#{isEmergency}, update_By=#{updateBy}, update_Date=#{updateDate} where id #{id}
